text: @JoeBiden Yeah,it’s because of the Coronavirus. Or did you forget about that. I don’t want to be rude but what is the matter with your wife she’s a doctor isn’t she. Is she that desperate to be First Lady.God help you because no one in your family cares about your cognitive health.
